text:
Elena Cotta Ramusino (born 19 August 1931) is an Italian actress. She has appeared on stage and in movies and television since the 1950s. In 2013, at 82 years old, she won the Volpi Cup for Best Actress for her role in "A Street in Palermo". She appeared in the Australian movie "Looking for Alibrandi" (2000). Cotta has also appeared in "Your Hands on My Body" (1970), "Loro" (2018) and "The Man Without Gravity" (2019).
Cotta was born in Milan.
